TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUserCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUserCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 以编程方式访问和修改 `users` `credentials` `forms` 配置节部分中部分的元素 `authorization` 。The uses the to programmatically access and modify the `users` element of the `credentials` section in the `forms` section of the `authorization` configuration section. 此类型是包含 、和类型的组的一部分 。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用元素， `credentials` 请确保遵循[ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))中所述的准则。If you use the `credentials` element be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). 为了实现可伸缩性和更好的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[保护 ASP.NET 应用](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications)程序和[构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序：身份验证、授权和安全通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10))。For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, see [Securing Your ASP.NET Application](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications) and [Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将指令插入到 `clear` 配置文件的相应部分，以清除对更高级别配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 将删除当前配置文件的相应部分中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将一个 `remove` 元素插入到配置文件的相应部分，该部分是在更高级配置文件中定义的任何元素。This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果在当前配置文件的相应部分中定义了元素，则会从配置文件中删除其条目。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 集合中必须存在要删除的对象。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#9)]
